      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomloose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

          <title>
            <string language="de">Berlin und Irkutsk - Ein Klimavergleich</string>
            <string language="en">Berlin and Irkutsk - comparison of climate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Berlin et Irkoutsk - comparaison du climat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Berlim e Irkutsk - comparação do clima</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Berlino ed Irkutsk - confronto del clima</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βερολίνο και Ιρκούτσκ - σύγκριση του κλίματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Berlín e Irkutsk - comparación del clima</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Berlin und Irkutsk liegen annähernd auf der gleichen geografischen Breite. Für beide Orte liegen Klimatabellen vor, die zu vergleichen und zu interpretieren sind.</string>
            <string language="en">On almost the same geographical latitude, compare Berlin and Irkutsk and interpret both of the climate tables.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Klima</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Klimadiagramm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Asien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Irkutsk</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Europa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Deutschland</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Berlin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Climate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Climatic diagram</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Asia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Irkutsk</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Europe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Germany</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Berlin</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>1</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sur presque la même latitude géographique, 
comparez Berlin et Irkoutsk et interprétez toutes les deux tables de 
climat.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quase na mesma latitude geográfica, compare 
Berlim e Irkutsk e interprete ambas as tabelas do clima.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quasi sulla stessa latitudine geografica, 
confronti Berlino ed Irkutsk ed interpreti entrambe le tabelle di 
clima.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχεδόν στο ίδιο γεωγραφικό γεωγραφικό πλάτος, 
συγκρίνετε το Βερολίνο και το Ιρκούτσκ και ερμηνεύστε και των δύο
από τους πίνακες κλίματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En casi la misma latitud geográfica, compare 
Berlín e Irkutsk e interprete ambos vectores del clima.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
